perturbation.original_text: b. Arbitration. The parties intend to negotiate in good faith and resolve any dispute arising under this Agreement. In the event the parties are unable to resolve any such dispute to binding arbitration for settlement in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association, the arbitrator will determine the manner in which the parties are to pay the costs of such arbitration, including reasonable attorneys' fees
perturbation.changed_text: b. Arbitration. The parties intend to negotiate in good faith and resolve any dispute arising under this Agreement. In the event the parties are unable to resolve any such dispute to binding arbitration for settlement in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association, the arbitrator will determine the manner in which the parties are to pay the costs of such arbitration, including reasonable attorneys' fees. Any arbitration shall be conducted at a time and place of mutual convenience to the parties.
perturbation.explanation: By adding that arbitration should be conducted at a time and place of mutual convenience to both parties can lead to delays and difficulties in initiating the process due to differing interpretations. Making a change in the text of the arbitration clause weakens it. Arbitration clauses are legally required to be conspicuous and without ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text:
10. Warranty; Limitation of Liability.

a. Distributor Warranty. Distributor represents that it has requisite knowledge and experience to provide the products and services contracted for herein.

b. Erchonia Warranty and Warranty Limitations: Other than the written warranty accompanying the Products, Erchonia DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS.

c. IN NO EVENT SHALL Erchonia BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OF PROFIT OR ANY OTHER COMMERCIAL DAMAGE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR OTHER INDIRECT DAMAGES UNDER ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, CLAIMS ARISING FROM MALFUNCTION OR DEFECTS IN THE PRODUCTS.
perturbation.changed_text:
10. Warranty; Limitation of Liability.

a. Distributor Warranty. Distributor represents that it has requisite knowledge and experience to provide the products and services contracted for herein.

b. Erchonia Warranty and Warranty Limitations: Other than the written warranty accompanying the Products, Erchonia DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT OF THIRD PARTY INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS. If the products are purchased for personal use, warranty may not apply.

c. IN NO EVENT SHALL Erchonia BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OF PROFIT OR ANY OTHER COMMERCIAL DAMAGE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR OTHER INDIRECT DAMAGES UNDER ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, CLAIMS ARISING FROM MALFUNCTION OR DEFECTS IN THE PRODUCTS.
perturbation.explanation: By adding the qualification "If the products are purchased for personal use, warranty may not apply," creates uncertainty in the scope of the warranty. The added ambiguity weakens the enforceability and clarity of the warranty provisions, violating consumer protection principles and potentially misrepresenting the coverage available to end-users.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Magnuson-Moss Warranty Act (if applicable to consumer sales)

perturbation.original_text: e. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed in all respects by the laws of the United States and the State of Florida, except for conflict of laws provisions. The parties agree that for any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, venue and personal jurisdiction shall be in the federal or state court with competent jurisdiction located in Brevard Country, Florida.
perturbation.changed_text: e. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed in all respects by the laws of the United States and the State of Florida, except for conflict of laws provisions. The parties agree that for any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, venue and personal jurisdiction shall be in the federal or state court with competent jurisdiction located in Brevard Country, Florida. However, the parties may mutually agree to litigate the dispute in California.
perturbation.explanation: By adding that 'However, the parties may mutually agree to litigate the dispute in California', creates ambiguity and uncertainty over the proper venue for disputes. Adding a provision to litigate in California provides an alternative option that contradicts the venue provision specified.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles on Venue and Jurisdiction
